name: Spectrum 6
description:
Spectrum 6 got FEATURED on US & Canada Appstore within its first week of release!

"SPECTRUM 6 is a substantial package that should appeal to any puzzle fans, lovers of art or anyone looking for another unique iOS experience" - TouchArcade

"Needless to say, if you're looking for a challenging puzzle game, then you shouldn't miss this one" - AppAdvice

"The gameplay is actually kind of therapeutic, akin to the effect of completing a page in an adult coloring book" - GameGulp

Mixing colors and assigning it to a certain place made the Spectrum6 a challenging yet fun experience.

From combining 2 primary colors such as Red, Yellow and Blue, you can create any secondary colors like Orange, Green or Violet. A neutral color Black can also be created by combining all the primary colors.

Features:
* 60 MIND-TEASING LEVELS
* It will give you several hours of fun to solve all the levels

* HAVE FUN MIXING COLORS
* Learn and enjoy mixing colorful blocks

* SEVERAL GAME MECHANICS
* Always fresh, Always excited!

* HINT PER MOVE
* Hints that help you just enough for you to solve

* NEW HOLIDAY THEME
* Feel the holiday of 2016!

* SUPPORTS GAME CENTER
